Teltoli's green eyes lit up at the prospect of travelling again, and she darted one last look at the lake before trotting up beside Carnage.

"Sure! I have nothing better to do anyway! The Maximals seem to be having R&R for the time being, and travelling sounds like fun!"

She smiled and shook her wings, before settling them on her back again. It had become a habit now. The Fuzor looked up and saw snow-capped mountains, glistening with the sun. Her eyes widened and she said..

"Woah!! Why don't we go there!" She points with a paw to the mountains..
